verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Israel thlahai kuomah hril la, an kuomah, ‘Pasal amanih, nuhmei amani khawma ieng amanih thutiem bîk, LALPA ta dinga inpêkna Nazarit thutiem ân tiem ding lai chun,
uoin le zû a nghei ding a nih; uoin thûr amanih, zu thûr khawm a dâwn ding a ni nawh.
Ân suktum sûng po chun grêp hruia mi a laimu khawm, a hâwng khawm a fâk ding a ni nawh.
Insuktumna thu ân tiem sûng po chun a lu khawm vâw dêr lo ding a nih. LALPA ta dinga insuktum ni a kim hmakhat chun suktum nîng a ta, a sam khawm a hla ding a nih.
LALPA ta dinga ân suktum sûng po chun mithi ruong khawm a hnai ding a ni nawh.
A pa hai, a nu hai, a unaupa hai, a farnu hai amanih thi thua khawm ân sukpawrche ding a ni nawh. Pathien ta dinga ân suktumna chun a khuop leiin.
“Ân suktum sûng po chun LALPA ta dinga inthieng a nih.
A kâwlah mi hung thi ta thutin, ân suktumna lu chu lo sukpawrche ta ang sienla, a inthien ni, a ni sari ni chun a lu chu a vaw ding a nih.
Chun, ni riet ni chun intuokna puon in kawtkhârah thiempu kuom- ah vaṭhu tuok khat amanih, pârvate tuok khat amanih a hung chawi ding a nih.

Thiempu chun pakhat chu suol thâwina dingin inhlân a ta, pakhat chu pumrawhmang thilinhlânah, mithi leia a suksuolnaa chun inrem- na siempêk a tih; chun, chu ni vêk chun a lu chu a sukthieng ding a nih.

Thiemnaw thâwina dingin be- râmte a chal kum khat mi hung chawiin ân suktumna nihai chu LALPA kuomah thaw ṭha nâwk a tih; ân suktumna chu sukpawrche a ni tâk leiin a hmaa mi kha iengkhawm a ni ta si nawh a.
Hi hi Nazarit mi, ân suktum ni bîk a kim phaa thaw dân ding chu a nih; intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun ṭhuoi nîng a ta.
Chun, LALPA ta dinga thilin- hlân dingin berâmchal kum khat mi demkailo pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin pakhat, suol inthâwina dingin berâmte, a la, kum khat mi demkailo pakhat,

inremna thilinhlân dingin berâmchal demkailo pakhat, chawl ṭhanglo bei le beiphit inditak hrieka hmeta siem beihlawm le hrieka chûl beiphêk inphân bâwm khat, an fâkmi thilinhlân ding le dâwnmi thilin- hlânhai leh an inhlân ding a nih.
Thiempu chun chuong chu LALPA hmaa chun inhlân a ta, a suol thâwina le pumrawhmang thilinhlân chu inhlân a tih.
Berâmchal chu bâwma chawl ṭhanglo bei le chun inremna in- thâwina thilinhlân dingin LALPA kuoma chun inhlân a tih. Thiempu chun fâkmi thilinhlân le dâwnmi thilinhlân khawm chu inhlân sa bawk a tih.
Nazarit mi chun intuokna puon in kawtkhâra chun ân suktumna lu chu vâwng a ta, insuktumna sam chu lâng a ta, inremna inthâwi thilinhlân hnuoia meia chun a raw ding a nih.

Chun, thiempu chun berâmchal dâr suong hmin le bâwma chawl ṭhanglo bei pakhat le chawl ṭhanglo beiphêk inphân pakhat lâng a ta. Nazarit mi chun ân suktumna lu chu a vâw zo chun inchawitir a tih; chun, thiempu chun thêna thilinhlân dingin LALPA hmaa chun a thên ding a nih.
Hi hi thiempu chanpuol in- thieng chu nîng a ta, a thêna thên ir le a mal leh; chu zoa chun Nazarit chun uoin chu dâwn thei tâng a tih.
Hi hi a nih Nazarit thutiem dân le LALPA hmaa an thilinhlân dân chu, ama nuomthua a înhlân tiem loin, ân suktumna thutiem izir peiin a thaw ding a nih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Aron le a naupasalhai kuomah, ‘Hieng ang hin Israel thlahai chu mal in sâwm ding a nih, an kuomah,
LALPAIN malsâwm cheuin,vêng pei raw se cheu;
LALPA chun a hmêl in chungah invartir sienla, lunginsiet pei raw se cheu;
LALPA chu nangni tieng hung ngha sienla, lungmuongna pe raw se cheu, ti ro,’ tiin hril rawh.
Chuongchun, Israel thlahai chunga chun ka hming chu inchuong- tir nîng a ta, chun, keiin anni chu malsâwm ka tih,” tiin.
